about.title: My Professional Journey
about.history: I was born in Konya in 1981. I am married and I have two daughters. I have completed the education process in Kırşehir until university examination. I have started medical education in Hacettepe University Medicine Faculty in 1998 and completed in 2006. At the same year I have started the emergency medicine residency program in Dışkapı Yıldırım Beyazıt Education and Training Hospital and completed in 2011. In 2014, I have received the title of Assoc.Prof.Dr. During the whole year in 2015, I worked as the educational and administrative chief officer of the department of emergency medicine in Bağcılar Education and Research Hospital. Between October 2016-December 2017 I work at Acıbadem Eskişehir Hospital as emergency physician. At 2018 January I started to work at Memeorial Ataşehir Hospital as Emergency Physician and Vice Managing Director for 1,5 yeras, and 2 years as Managing Director, between 2019 July-2021 August. I was working at emergency department as Emergency Physician also during I am working as Managing Director.
